title: Wirechat
author: Namu Makwembo
excerpt: Wirechat is a Laravel Livewire package for real-time chat. It supports private chats, group chats, message deletion, disappearing messages, and customizable UI. With just a few commands, add scalable, flexible chat features to your app effortlessly.
text: FreeWirechat is a Laravel Livewire package for real-time chat. It supports private chats, group chats, message deletion, disappearing messages, and customizable UI. With just a few commands, add scalable, flexible chat features to your app effortlessly.Launched inMessaging Open Source Developer Tools +1 byWirechat
html:
Free

Wirechat is a Laravel Livewire package for real-time chat. It supports private chats, group chats, message deletion, disappearing messages, and customizable UI. With just a few commands, add scalable, flexible chat features to your app effortlessly.

Launched in

Open Source
